ComicInfo.Title: The Flavor of Fear: Part 2; Who's 'Za-some?
ComicInfo.Series: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles New Animated Adventures
ComicInfo.Summary:
Michelangelo has uncovered the hidden truth behind everyone’s strange behavior! With his brothers incapacitated by a devastating mental attack, it’s up to Mikey to save the day!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Dario Brizuela | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Derek Charm | 2 | RE | Amazing Con Exclusive Cover | Eddie Nunez | 3 |
